name: World’sBiggestSmallGroup
0:
”Alexa open Small Group”
”Alexa launch Small Group”
”Alexa start Small Group”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: small group
des:
When life hits harder than ever, how do you make sense of it? How do you move forward?

If that’s you, the World’s Biggest Small Group can help! When you sign up, you’ll join over 30,000 people who were encouraged by our last study. We’ll send you inspiring stories from Christian artists and personalities who have been there, too.

Join the ever growing community by saying alexa launch worlds biggest small group, and listen to the latest podcast even when you are not registered by linking your amazon account to the skill. Once you register you have access to all podcasts of worlds biggest small group as and when they release and you can follow the series at your own pace by saving progress on the skill.
